name: plusb/pb_social
description: Pb_social enables you to get posts from social media networks into your TYPO3 system. Currently supported social media networks are: Facebook, Imgur, Instagram, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Tumblr, Twitter, YouTube, Vimeo and TYPO3 Extension tx_news

authors.name: plus B: Mikolaj Jedrzejewski, Robert Becker, Sergej Junker, Arend Maubach, Patricia Bartel, Ramon Mohi, Kai Lorenz
